text: Amanda Michelle Seyfried (born December 3, 1985)Judy Backrach. Wide Eyed Girl. September 2009. Allure magazine is an American actress, singer-songwriter and former child model. At 11, she became a child model, and at 15 she became a television actress. She is known for her roles in Mamma Mia! and Mean Girls. == Major film and television roles == She starred in As the World Turns and All My Children. In 2004, Seyfried started her movie career, acting in Mean Girls. She also appeared in a number of other movies: Nine Lives (2005), Alpha Dog (2006), Mamma Mia! (2008), Jennifer's Body, Chloe, Dear John, Veronica Mars and Letters to Juliet. In 2006, she had a lead role on HBO's television series Big Love. ==Awards and nominations== Year Work Award Category Result Ref The Dropout Dorian Television Awards Best TV Performance Gold Derby Television Awards Best Limited/Movie Actress Hollywood Television Critics Association Best Actress in a Streaming Limited or Anthology Series or Movie Online Film and Television Association Best Actress in a Motion Picture or Limited Series Primetime Emmy Awards Outstanding Lead Actress in a Limited Series or Movie Television Critics Association Individual Achievement in Drama Critics' Choice Television Awards Best Actress in a Limited Series or Movie Made for Television Golden Globe Awards Best Actress in a Miniseries or Television Film Screen Actors Guild Awards Outstanding Female Actor in a Miniseries or Television Movie == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Models from Pennsylvania Category:Actors from Allentown, Pennsylvania Category:Singers from Pennsylvania
title: Amanda Seyfried
